name: Pixel
description: Pixel is a shinyYellow oscilloscope-themed robot with a broken screen. With its cat-shaped buttons and handDown arms and legs, it adds a touch of playfulness to its appearance. It is also often seen wearing stylish shades, which gives it a cool and mysterious vibe. Pixel is a member of the WebtrES club, a group of robots dedicated to exploring the depths of the internet and uncovering its secrets.
